name: Craigus' Feedly Dark Theme
description:
Basic dark theme for feedly.

Works with latest feedly as at Jun 23, 2017.
additional_info:
Enable the "black cat" theme first (as I didn't style the side bar).

This theme makes a dark theme for the most common feedly use case of reading feeds. :) 

It probably doesn't dark theme other functions properly (e.g. preferences, etc).

16-Nov-2016 - Fix case where some articles remained in dark text, making unreadable, and some link style fixes.
23-Jun-2017 - Make Feedly dark again! Updates for latest feedly.
10-Nov-2017 - Make scrollbars dark (in Chrome)
